text: Satya Vrat Shastri (29 September 1930 â€“ 14 November 2021) was an Indian Sanskrit scholar, writer and poet.41st and 42nd Jnanpith Awards, Official Press release He was an honorary professor at the Special Centre for Sanskrit Studies at Jawaharlal Nehru University. He was the Head of the Department of Sanskrit. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian academics Category:20th-century Indian poets Category:Indian critics
